description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任中国科学技术协会常委、党组成员、书记处书记，是第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. He served as a Standing Committee member, Party Leadership Group member, and Secretary of the Secretariat of the China Association for Science and Technology, and was a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

nodes.id: 中国科学技术协会第六次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国科学技术协会第六次全国代表大会
en: Sixth National Congress of the China Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术协会于2001年6月召开的全国代表大会。
description.en: The national congress of the China Association for Science and Technology held in June 2001.

description.zh-cn: 宋南平是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Song Nanping is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

position.zh-cn: 常委、党组成员、书记处书记
position.en: Standing Committee Member, Party Leadership Group Member, Secretary of the Secretariat

description.zh-cn: 2001年6月，在中国科学技术协会第六次全国代表大会上当选为第六届全国委员会书记处书记。
description.en: In June 2001, he was elected as the Secretary of the Secretariat of the Sixth National Committee at the Sixth National Congress of the China Association for Science and Technology.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.zh-cn: 第十一届全国政协委员、提案委员会专委
position.en: Member of the 11th National Committee, Special Member of the Proposal Committee

description.zh-cn: 2008年当选第十一届全国政协委员，代表中国科学技术协会，分入第二十三组，并担任提案委员会专委。
description.en: In 2008, he was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing the China Association for Science and Technology in the 23rd group, and served as a special member of the Proposal Committee.

relationships.source: 中国科学技术协会第六次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 宋南平在此次大会上当选为中国科学技术协会第六届全国委员会书记处书记。
description.en: Song Nanping was elected as the Secretary of the Secretariat of the Sixth National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology at this congress.
